fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Quick Attack: Choose one player to deal a Basic attack to. This attack resolves immediately. (1 use)
- Endeavor: Sets your target's Defense to your current Defense level. (2 uses)
- Whirlwind: Switch the positions of two players you choose. You cannot target yourself.
- Evolve: Evolve into Staraptor. May only be used once 2 players have been attacked or killed as a result of Whirlwind.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The effects of Endeavor last for an additional night after its use.
- You will be notified if a Whirlwind target was attacked.

fields.name: Pokemon Ability:
fields.value: - Keen Eye: Grants immunity to abilities that roleblock.
